about_the_game:
This demo contains 2 playable ships and an array of weapons to get started on your pirate adventure. Defeat the Royal Watch capital carrier and continue on to endless mode against the Watch and the Mercenary Knights from the full game! Several map types and a good selection of weapons are available to get you familiar with Broadside Renegades and the action within.

Choose between the Widows Lament, a heavier vessel with powerful broadside attacks, and the Shooting Star, a high skill ceiling sniper fighter that must transform to shoot.

Defeating the carrier will allow you to continue a run endlessly in an attempt to best your highest booty!
